content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Electricity generator at position(-3.5, 3.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position -9.5, -0.5), boiler (position -7.5, 0.0), pipe group (position -7.5, -1.5) and steam engine (position -3.5, 3.5)

#### Assembling machine at position(6.5, 3.5)
Consists of assembling machine (position 6.5, 3.5)

### ERROR TIPS

* Errors when placing steam engine at a position that is occupied or unplaceable
  - Ensure the target location is clear and placeable before attempting to place the steam engine
* Errors when inserting items into an assembling machine
  - Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the assembling machine
* Errors when entities are not connected to the power network
  - Ensure that the entities are properly connected to the power network using electric poles

### NAMESPACE

No functions have been defined by the agent.
